messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode?
ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode is a custom node in ComfyUI that allows users to download Hugging Face repositories and spaces.
What are the prerequisites for using ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode?
The prerequisites for using ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode include having a Hugging Face hub and an access token from your Hugging Face account.

To install ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode, you need to clone the repo to your ComfyUI custom nodes folder, activate your ComfyUI environment, install the package, and export the HF_TOKEN environment variable.
What are the options available in the individual mode of ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode?
In the individual mode of ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode, you can select a single or comma-separated names from a repository to download specific files.
How can you specify a path for downloading files using ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode?

You can specify a path for downloading files using ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode, or use the default directory at the root of ComfyUI/models/IF_AI with the same name as the repository you are downloading.
What is the purpose of the exclude option in ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode?
The exclude option in ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode allows you to exclude specific files when downloading a whole repository or space.
What are the related tools mentioned for ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode?

The related tools mentioned for ComfyUI-IF_AI_HFDownloaderNode are IF_prompt_MKR, a similar tool available for Stable Diffusion WebUI, and IF_AI_tools, LLM Nodes for chatting and creating SD prompts locally with Ollama or via APIs.
